external_references.description: Azure Edge and Platform Security Team & Microsoft 365 Defender Research Team. (2021, December 8). Improve kernel security with the new Microsoft Vulnerable and Malicious Driver Reporting Center. Retrieved April 6, 2022.
Jordan Geurten et al. . (2022, March 29). Microsoft recommended driver block rules. Retrieved April 7, 2022.

description: On Windows 10, enable Attack Surface Reduction (ASR) rules to prevent an application from writing a signed vulnerable driver to the system.(Citation: Malicious Driver Reporting Center) On Windows 10 and 11, enable Microsoft Vulnerable Driver Blocklist to assist in hardening against third party-developed drivers.(Citation: Microsoft driver block rules)
